firewall: Inosefa network traffic zvichibva pane yakatarwa yemitemo
utachiona: Iyo yakaipa software yakagadzirirwa kudzokorora uye kuparadzira
malware: Izwi rakakura rinosanganisira mavhairasi, makonye, Trojans, nezvimwe.
phishing: Maemail ehutsotsi achiedza kunyengedza vashandisi kuti vape ruzivo
ransomware: Malware inovharidzira mafaera, ichida kubhadharwa kwedecryption
encryption: Maitiro ekukwenya data kuti isaverengeke pasina kiyi
decryption: Maitirwo ekusaverengera encrypted data kudzokera kune inoverengeka fomu
vulnerability: Kushaya simba mune software kana hurongwa hunogona kushandiswa
exploit: Kodhi kana nzira inotora mukana wekusagadzikana
kutyora data: Kuwana zvisina mvumo kana kuburitswa kweruzivo rwakadzama
pasiwedhi: Rudzi rwechakavanzika rwemavara anoshandiswa kuratidza chokwadi
mbiri factor authentication: Inoda imwe chidimbu chekusimbisa kunze kwepassword
social engineering: Kunyengedza vanhu kuti vape ruzivo rwakavanzika
kuyedza kupinda: Yakatenderwa kutevedzera kurwiswa kuti uwane kusasimba muhurongwa
zero zuva kurwisa: Inoshandisa kusagadzikana uko mutengesi wesoftware asingazive
botnet: Network yemakomputa ane utachiona anodzorwa neanorwisa
kunyimwa basa rekurwisa: Kufashamira sisitimu ine traffic kuti isawanikwe
access control: Kutonga ndiani kana chii chine mvumo kune zviwanikwa
intrusion yekuona system: Monitors network kana masisitimu ezviitwa zvisina mvumo
chiitiko mhinduro: Iyo seti yemaitiro anoteverwa kana chiitiko chekuchengetedza chikaitika
njodzi kuongororwa: Kuziva uye kuongorora zvinogona kutyisidzira uye kusasimba
kupora kwenjodzi: Ronga kudzoreredza masisitimu uye mashandiro mushure mekuvhiringidzwa
